sentence.Network_en: Spiders, mites, etc. come under the head of Arachnida.
sentence.Network_cn: 蜘蛛 、 螨等归入蛛形纲.

sentence.Network_en: Arachnida and Cecidomyidae had a higher relative abundance than other families being 0.3465 and 0.2309, respectively.
sentence.Network_cn: 蜘蛛类的相对丰盛度最高,为0.3465,瘿蚊科的相对丰盛度为0.2309, 二者在群落中所占比例较高.

sentence.Network_en: The energy content and their seasonal variations of Arachnida in arid environment were studied.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究干旱地区蛛形纲动物的含能值变动规律.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 图文2007年6月5日 - 蛛形纲(Arachnida) 节肢动物门螯肢动物亚门最大的1纲,包括蜘蛛、蝎和蜱螨等,蛛形类的身体分成前体和后体。前体由 6节组成,背面通常包以一块坚硬.
arachnid 纺绩器, arachnida 蜘蛛纲, arachnida 蜘蛛目

means.word_mean: 1. a large class of arthropods including spiders and ticks and scorpions and daddy longlegs; have four pairs of walking legs and no wings
